stimulusHtml: What, if anything, will be the contents of  newVals  after executing the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

boolean[] oldVals = {true, false, true, true};
boolean[] newVals = new boolean[4];
for (int j = oldVals.length - 1; j >= 0; j--)
{
   newVals[j] = !(oldVals[j]);
}

choicesHtml: The array  newVals  will not contain any values because the code segment does not compile.
